title: BRIEF-Atlas Consolidated Mining And Development Corp 9-Month Revenue Up 18% To 13.03 Billion Pesos

BRIEF-Atlas Consolidated Mining And Development Corp 9-Month Revenue Up 18% To 13.03 Billion Pesos Oct 28 (Reuters) - Atlas Consolidated Mining and Development

Corp :

* 9-MONTH REVENUE UP 18% TO 13.03 BILLION PESOS

* 9-MONTH NET LOSS 45 MILLION PESOS VERSUS LOSS OF 783

MILLION

PESOS
